website_summaries.verdict: For those concerned about using cosmetics with chemicals but looking for an effective hydrating mist, this product is perfect to provide peace of mind.
pros: This mist is 100% organic and not tested on animals
Effective in improving the texture of skin in just several uses
Doesn’t irritate sensitive skin due to natural ingredients
Spraying this after applying makeup allows face to have a natural glow
cons: Some users don’t enjoy the light and natural scent of this product

customer_reviews.title: This mist has replaced all my other skin care products!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Neroli mist about a year and a half ago and have been using ever since. Love this product. I thought it was a little pricey at first but since I’ve started using this mist it has replaced all other skin moisturizing products which contributes to the savings. I use this product twice a day, morning and night. The fine mist bottle goes on so light and evenly there’s no need to even touch your face to rub in, it absorbs quickly and keeps skin hydrated all day with no greasy feel or residue and can be used sparingly. One bottle last about 3 months for me. Will continue using!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! My skin is severely dry due to my thyroid medication. I spray this after using moisturizer and it’s added hydration. Really love this! First time buying eminence on amazon. Seems legit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy moisture spray
customer_reviews.text: I love how this feels on my face and the smell is soothing too. Im not into fragrances but this spray has it all! My skin feels moisturized and healthy. I use in the morning and evening. Ive ordered several.
customer_reviews.author: Snipergrl69

customer_reviews.title: Great resukts
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this a few years back and was so impressed with the results (less irritated face) I continue to purchase. Not cheap, but I think it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Jude

customer_reviews.title: ... separated when I received it and it did not like look the product I had previously purchased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and it was separated when I received it and it did not like look the product I had previously purchased. The smell was off and the product integrity was compromised. This product should never have been sent to me. Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Terupt

customer_reviews.title: Strange scent and sticky residue.
customer_reviews.text: Smell was weird and it left a sticky residue behind. It didn't irritate just for an anti aging product I want my skin to feel fresh, moiturized and glowing and it did none of that. I was surprised at all the good reviews. It went back and I purchased my stand by of stone crop face mist! Hands down the best!
customer_reviews.author: Bluesky2

customer_reviews.title: Smells divine, but for normal or oily skin type
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the neroli smell in summer. Not very hydrating though. I spray and let it dry. If you have dry skin you might need to apply a cream moisturizer after it dries.
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. This has replaced every other skin care product. I have combination skin, so it gets oily some places and dry others. This keeps my face moisturized without getting oily! Amazing. Will be buying again until I die
customer_reviews.author: Cata Tiplea

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin soft, but it's a little on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.text: Makes the skin more soft for a little while. Not sure how much it really moisturizes, which is what I was looking for. I do like that it's in a convenient spray so you can get a quick pick-me-up when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Nyte

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look or smell like the real product.
customer_reviews.text: Smelled funny and looked like it was watered down. Will not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Gross Product
customer_reviews.text: Gross. White chunks floating all around it! Stinks! No idea what is in this but it's nasty. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin look great
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful toner that has excellent ingredients and makes your skin look and feel great. You don't need to use anything else with this . Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eudice

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product! The scent, the way it sprays, the quality... Eminence hasn’t let me down yet!
customer_reviews.author: Loreta

customer_reviews.title: Bad reaction.
customer_reviews.text: My face swelled up after using this product and never received the refund I requested, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product with strong alochol.
customer_reviews.text: Too much alochol in this mist, be careful to hurt eyes.
customer_reviews.author: constance chan

customer_reviews.title: Eminence products are the ultimate indulgence!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely allow myself to spend the money on these products, but when I do I understand why they are at the price point they are. They are like a vacation for the skin!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Hydration in CA
customer_reviews.text: An aesthetician used the Eminence products on me and I have gradually changed over to it. The mist smells better than anything I have ever smelled and here in CA I need hydration. I use before anything, then after, if I put on minerals.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: this is a great product, lasts quite a long time and gives ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product, lasts quite a long time and gives a great finish after putting on moisturizer. Eminence products are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: maggieo

customer_reviews.title: I like this and I love the eminence line of skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Upon inital use I noticed a definite difference. My skin appeared smoother and a bit taut. I like this and I love the eminence line of skin care. I can't wait to observe how my skin responds to continued use.
customer_reviews.author: DeeCee

customer_reviews.title: works great and other products last ever so much longer
customer_reviews.text: use it as a spray before applying body or face moisterizer. works great and other products last ever so much longer.
customer_reviews.author: vsw

customer_reviews.title: refreshing and hydrating. must have .
customer_reviews.text: refreshing and hydrating. it is a must have for me. the best toner from eminence in my opinion. good for dry skin
customer_reviews.author: dee dee

customer_reviews.title: Makes my face glow.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! First, I apply my makeup then spray this on my face. It leaves makes my face glow.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Parker

customer_reviews.title: but I will purchase again simply because I love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's really doing anything for my skin to be honest, but I will purchase again simply because I love the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amy P

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing Skin Smoother!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product for a short time, but when I apply it to my face and neck area, it feels refreshing and definitely firms the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: The Neroli Mist arrived the following day in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Eminence Neroli Skin Toner
customer_reviews.text: So moisturizing...leaves your skin glowing. I love this toner. never leaves residue on your skin. Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen garza

customer_reviews.title: Spray Away a Hot Day!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to on a hot day! A quick spritz and I'm calm and cool. Fragrance is pleasant and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Diver

customer_reviews.title: but the product is amazing and it has no scent once it dries
customer_reviews.text: The smell when you first spray it can be a little off-putting, but the product is amazing and it has no scent once it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: my skin loves it.
customer_reviews.text: moisturizes, hydrates and refreshes the skin without residue. great alcohol free toner that feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this! You can't go wrong with Eminence products.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this one before bed with the rest of the regimen and you will wake up looking younger.
customer_reviews.author: J Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Have used emminence products for years
customer_reviews.text: Eminence products are top notch. My skin has never been easy- earlier in life it was oily and prone to break outs. Now I'm 50 and it's getting dry. Spraying this mist before applying the moisturizer helps everything get absorbed. My skin is healthy and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Livingston

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: Eminence is by far the best of the organic skin care products out there. They are carefully and wonderfully made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stewart Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Adds a lot of moisture with just one spritz ... I put it on a cotton pad and then on my face after washing... Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Wingnet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and my skin just soaks up this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Nice little moisture boost, easy to use and Eminence is a good name in facial products. I first was introduced to this product at a spa where I had a facial. Bought it for use at home. Will continue to use especially during the warm summer months.
customer_reviews.author: C. Matheson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: product is great, however spray pump stopped working & still have 1/2 bottle left.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McGlynn

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love eminence products and this one did not disappoint. It was exactly as the description said it would be and works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen grimes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is a really good way to hydrate the face!

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: First time using a product like this and its so refreshing. Face feels so fresh and clean. Product is a must

customer_reviews.title: I love the Eminence line and to be able to pay ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the Eminence line and to be able to pay less for it on Amaxon is also a plus
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So, so refreshing! I use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love it and use it religiously
customer_reviews.text: really helpful to spray during the day when it's cold and dry outside. Love it and use it religiously.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light weight and doesn't make my combintion skin greasy. This product is still new to me, but love it so far
customer_reviews.author: Dana D

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Emminence Products
customer_reviews.text: I love eminence products. I have been using them fot several years now and dont have anyyhing negative to say. They are all great!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Best skin are products ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many of their skin are products for over ten years. Products are chosen just for your skin type...
customer_reviews.author: C. Vittitoe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Smells SO GOOD and seems to work well! It absorbs very well, so make up application over the top of it is amazing. There is no oily residue or anything. I LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Emommie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Products are great, even better that what i spect. they got on time, perfect conditions,
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: I love these products
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. My skin has shown vast improvement since using this product. I have great confidence that I am not using harmful chemicals. I try to use only organic products.
customer_reviews.author: kay sabow

customer_reviews.title: My skin drinks it up, especially as the air ...
customer_reviews.text: My skin drinks it up, especially as the air gets dryer in the winter. However I must say that while it is pleasant, something about the fragrance bothers my bronchi.
customer_reviews.author: s o.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other Eminence products at salons when getting a facial so decided to try a few of the anti aging products. This is a wonderful spray mist with Neroli essential oil. The only concern is that when i spray it on my neck, I experience a bit of hyper sensitivity and some redness which usually calms down within a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  B.

customer_reviews.title: ... use this and other eminence products and I'm very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I use this and other eminence products and I'm very pleased with them. I would recommend eminence highly hyper. I particularly like the facial products.
customer_reviews.author: Doris McPartlan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: A lot of money, sray on, wipe off, can't get near your eyes, much better toners available for the price. Wen't back to Skinceuticals.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Princess

customer_reviews.title: Faith restored
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I’ve always bought from an Eminence dealer/salon and was very hesitant to buy my products now from Amazon (since I’ve moved) from some of the reviews I’ve read about products being old, used, and etc. Since I’ve used this product for awhile, I was quickly able to discern the quality/age of product. It was nice to receive it wrapped in unopened plastic. Product was fresh and new and I’m so very pleased. I don’t remember what I paid for this in the past, but I’m more a person of convenience and this purchase was fast, fresh, and convenient!! Thank you!! Will buy again as my other products run low.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best toner I have ever used! Not only is it 100% organic and is never tested on animals, it smells so nice and is very soothing to mature, sensitive skin. After a few applications, there is a noticeable improvement n skin tone and texture. I'm 68 and I get compliments all the time on how pretty my skin is.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Guy

customer_reviews.title: Don't love
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this product isn't very good. It smells fine and it acts as a hydrator, but I think the product line is made with not-such-great product. Also, it's not organic, they just call it organic and it isn't even on the cruelty free list. Ho hum. Won't buy this line again.
customer_reviews.author: HorseGirlCalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Eminence Top of the Line
customer_reviews.text: Love Eminence Skin care products. My sister-in-law is an esthetician and she uses these products. I have also used Dermalogica and Philosophy products in the past. I like those as well but Eminence is my favorite skin care line. I get plenty of compliments on my skin and questions on what I products I use.
customer_reviews.author: emcst36

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for years but for some reason, this bottle has made me have bumps on my forehead. I have it to my friend and she started getting numbs on her cheek. I've never experienced anything like this before and I haven't changed anything else in my routine.
customer_reviews.author: m. green

customer_reviews.title: Love this line!
customer_reviews.text: i love this line of skin care. i am 63 and have no wrinkles around my eyes and few on my face and neck. The eye cream has over time also removed the dark circles under my eyes that were a real problem a year ago. Can't speak highly enough about this line. Yes they are pricey but the eye cream has lasted almost a year! I bought it last September and still have enough to last at least two more months.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Firms Your Face!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have product for mature skin as it works wonders with firming. The smell is somewhat "different" but after it dries you hardly notice it. Also, it works well under BB creams and/or mineral foundation powders. I have been using it every day and have received a few compliments regarding how "great" I look. This is an Eminence product I will purchase again and again!
customer_reviews.author: jelbell06

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin feel refreshed and moist.
customer_reviews.text: I love how this makes my skin feel and I use it everyday. It is pricey but it does last about 5-6 months if used as directed. I love the soft subtle scent.
customer_reviews.author: DeniseG

customer_reviews.title: Tighten & tone with no breakouts or dryness!
customer_reviews.text: I love Eminence products and this spray is one of my favorites now. I’ve been using for a few weeks and love how the mist instantly tones & tightens my skin. I’ve read complaints about the smell but I like it... it smells clean & natural. I struggle with dry skin & anti aging products but I’ve been using this mist daily with no dryness or breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: MandaVDV

customer_reviews.title: Smell is aweful
customer_reviews.text: I love eminence products! This one missed the mark. No noticeable difference in skin and it smells like alcohol! I had miltiple friends ask if I had been drinking! Lol Smells horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Ballenger

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this at a spa in Hawaii and loved what it did for my skin. Still liking it in the dry climate of Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years, but this bottle arrived looking like sour milk, separated and with large white curds floating around. Shaking vigorously didn't help. And it stinks, too. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: The scent is the thing
customer_reviews.text: There have been comments about the scent. I agree that it's different. The scent isn't horrible, but it's not something I want to continue to smell. For this I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Best stuff ever works great for oily skin and don’t want to use moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Wilkes Eltermann

customer_reviews.title: lovely product by my favorite line. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Gentle, hydrating, lovely product by my favorite line. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin feel so GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other Eminence products,this is wonderful!! It smells so great as well!!! I will never use any other products!! These are the best products!! I eve got my daughters using them, and they love them too!! I just wish I would have found them along time ago!!
customer_reviews.author: marlene machado

customer_reviews.title: I like this but it really doesn't last long enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it really doesn't last long enough for what it cost. You'd need to replace at least monthly so I'm just going to sacrifice this toner from my regime
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This one is my favorite product!! I have been using Eminence for quite a while but when I added this to my skin care regimen I saw a difference in the complexion and smoothness of my skin!! I'm sticking to this
customer_reviews.author: solo20

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using this product and feel that it is an ...
customer_reviews.text: Eminence Organics Neroli Age Corrective Mist: Hydrates the skin, but leaves it somewhat sticky. The product is high quality and the smell of Neroli is calming. I enjoy using this product and feel that it is an important part in my Eminence skin care regiment.
customer_reviews.author: Audra H.

customer_reviews.title: Emince Orgaincs Neroli Hydrating Mist
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh scent and is refreshing especially in the summertime. Use just prior to applying face cream makes for lighter moisturizing which is perfect during hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Beauty Products
customer_reviews.text: Eminence Organics are wonderful products. Neroli Age Corrective Hydrating Mist is a wonderful toner and as is all their products all natural ingregients. It works well with their products and others.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Beer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This skin spray is awesome!! Feels so good when it goes on and smells so nice! Love all the Eminence products I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: B. Paquette

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend the entire line
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding product. I will forever continue to use Eminence. It is natural, organic and homemade. I highly recommend the entire line. It matters what we put on our body.
customer_reviews.author: TasteandSee348

customer_reviews.title: smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of neroli and this is a product I use regularly. The Eminence brand is a quality skincare line well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Will remain a staple in my skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this product but ordered anyway based on reviews. Love it. Will remain a staple in my skin care regimen.
customer_reviews.author: VeeDubs

customer_reviews.title: Makes skin feel silky
customer_reviews.text: I love Eminence and they never seem to disappoint. This product is no exception. I use after cleansing and it makes my face instantly feel hydrated and silky soft.
customer_reviews.author: LD13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Feels great on my skin and seems to tighten pores.
customer_reviews.author: Angel O

customer_reviews.title: Love that fresh feeling!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My face feels fresh after spraying it on. It has never bothered my eyes. Some of the other reviewers said the smell bothered them but it doesn't bother me. I haven't bought an Eminence product I didn't love!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Firming Spritz
customer_reviews.text: wonderful product, skin feels clean and more firm. This is a natural product that I found in a spa and then found online
customer_reviews.author: cheryl jo williamson

customer_reviews.title: Light moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Very light. Smells a little like fresh cut grass which is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this- great to hydrate your skin in the winter. Refreshing in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I saw a difference in 3 days-I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Steele

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how refreshing this is. I have been using this after cleansing for over a year and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this tonic makes my skin feel. Fast delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but find the smell quite different.
customer_reviews.author: anitab

customer_reviews.title: ... Corrective Hydrating Mist for a few years and always love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this Neroli Age Corrective Hydrating Mist for a few years and always love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not my Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Eminence facial product purchased and I must admit, I prefer the previous one over this one. At 62 years, I thought this one may have more age-appropriate benefits, but I'm having issues getting past the fragrance. It reminds me of the pile of burnt leaves as a kid, so it takes some getting used to. And I wished it felt more moisturizing or refreshing. In my opinion, it really doesn't. I'll buy the original one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: mk728

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: Quick service! Wonderful smelling product! I spray directly on my face and neck after I use ACV for toner. Takes a second to dry so I can put my Eminence moisturizers on. I read that it can be applied to a cotton ball and applied to face. I like the direct route to face, however, one might make the product last longer if applied to a cotton ball first. Very light weight and refreshing feeling to skin!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great smell. Feels great on the face. Nice firming and moisture for face neck and hands. Will certainly order again
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: nice smell, too
customer_reviews.text: This spray works well throughout the day when you need a little refreshing. I feel dewy and glowing; nice smell, too.
customer_reviews.author: carrie m smith

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell and fresh feel.
customer_reviews.text: It feels fresh and smells nice. I do not know if it helps my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kali raina

customer_reviews.title: New skin ahead!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! My skin looks clearer and luminous.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie Marinus

customer_reviews.title: Skin felt great, immediately !
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Eminence Organics fan..all their products are AMAZING and WORTH THE PRICE!! Invest in yourself and skin.. This stuff feels great, and works great! I personally don't think it smells bad at all, but that's just me..I tend to think about the quality ingredients going on and into my skin over any thing else :)
customer_reviews.author: Kera M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought as a Christmas gift. Recipient loves it!
customer_reviews.author: ABC

product_meta.title: Eminence Organics Neroli Age Corrective Hydrating Mist, 4.2 Ounce
product_meta.description: Eminence organics neroli age corrective hydrating mist (4 ounce or 125 ml) benefits for all skin types, especially mature hydrates and renews the skin dramatically tightens and firms the skin provides age-defying protection against skin damaging free-radicals collagen levels are increase by 25% in just 6 days softens wrinkles and crows feet dramatically in 28 days skin appears tighter in as little as 5 minutes features neroli oil hydrates and softens the skin natural retinol alternative complex immediately lifts and tightens coconut milk and water moisturizes, softens and tones the skin carrot supplies vitamin A to the skin phytocelltec Swiss green apple is a rejuvenating plant stem cell concentrate eminence organics is a highly effective, entirely organic skin care line. With all naturally organic ingredients these hand-made products are effective and extremely healing. Rich in vitamins, active ingredients and nutrients, eminence products will give you immediate results that you will see and feel.
feature_bullets: Keeps pores clean and free from dirt
